title: Cameron Winter to Play Carnegie Hall on U.S. Tour
description: The Geese frontman also has December dates in London, Los Angeles, and Chicago
author: Walden Green
excerpt: The Geese frontman also has December dates in London, Los Angeles, and Chicago
text: Cameron Winter is set to play Carnegie Hall at the end of the year as part of a short run of U.S. headlining shows. This December, the Geese frontman will take the stage at Los Angeles’ Palace Theatre, Chicago’s Rockefeller Chapel, and the legendary New York venue—as well as London’s Roundhouse—in support of his debut solo album, Heavy Metal. Check out the dates below.Following the release of Heavy Metal in late 2024, Winter made his solo television debut on Jimmy Kimmel Live! with a horns-and-piano rendition of “Drinking Age.” He also performed “Love Takes Miles” on Later… with Jools Holland earlier this week. Last month, Winter debuted a new song, titled “LSD,” via a link that required following him on Spotify to hear it. The track has yet to receive a proper release.Read about Heavy Metal on “The 39 Best Albums of 2025 So Far.”All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. html:
Cameron Winter is set to play Carnegie Hall at the end of the year as part of a short run of U.S. headlining shows. This December, the Geese frontman will take the stage at Los Angeles’ Palace Theatre, Chicago’s Rockefeller Chapel, and the legendary New York venue—as well as London’s Roundhouse—in support of his debut solo album, Heavy Metal. Check out the dates below.

Following the release of Heavy Metal in late 2024, Winter made his solo television debut on Jimmy Kimmel Live! with a horns-and-piano rendition of “Drinking Age.” He also performed “Love Takes Miles” on Later… with Jools Holland earlier this week. Last month, Winter debuted a new song, titled “LSD,” via a link that required following him on Spotify to hear it. The track has yet to receive a proper release.

Read about Heavy Metal on “The 39 Best Albums of 2025 So Far.”

All products featured on Pitchfork are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Cameron Winter Live in Concert

Cameron Winter:

06-14 Manchester, TN - Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival
12-01 London, England - Roundhouse
12-11 New York, NY - Carnegie Hall
12-13 Los Angeles, CA - Palace Theatre
12-16 Chicago, IL - Rockefeller Chapel
